moves.name: Ember
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting burned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 2
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Dirty Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the move’s target or targets are affected by a status condition.
